title: Nier (video game)
summary: Nier[lower-alpha 1] is an action role-playing video game developed by Cavia and published by Square Enix for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 in April 2010. In Japan, the game was released as Nier Replicant[lower-alpha 2] for the PlayStation 3 with a younger main character, while an alternative version titled Nier Gestalt[lower-alpha 3] with an older main character was released for the Xbox 360; Gestalt was released outside of Japan as Nier for both platforms.[2] A remaster of the game, Nier Replicant ver.1.22474487139...[lower-alpha 4][lower-alpha 5], was released for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Windows on April 23, 2021.
